requirement.en: During your Main Phase that you Normal or Special Summoned this card, place 1 card from your hand on the bottom of the Deck.

effect.en: Add 1 "Handy Lady" from your Graveyard to your hand. Then, if you have no face-up Level 8 Fusion Monsters on your field, you can Fusion Summon by sending 2 WIND Attribute monsters with 1200 original DEF from your hand and/or field to the Graveyard as material.
